Customers.Tests Package

The customers.tests package contains unit tests and performance profiling tools for the customers package. These modules ensure the reliability and performance of customer-related functionalities.

Submodules

customers.tests.profiler_memory module

The profiler_memory module provides memory profiling tools for the customers package.

customers.tests.profiler_memory.run_memory_profiling()[source]

Runs pytest while profiling memory usage for the tests.

customers.tests.profiler_performance module

The profiler_performance module provides performance profiling tools for the customers package.

customers.tests.profiler_performance.profile_all_tests()[source]

Profiles all test functions in the test suite using cProfile.

customers.tests.test_app module

The test_app module contains unit tests for the customers package, covering functionalities like adding, updating, and deleting customers.

customers.tests.test_app.add_default_admin(db_session)[source]

Adds a default admin user to the database.

customers.tests.test_app.add_regular_user(db_session)[source]

Adds a regular customer user to the database.

customers.tests.test_app.app()[source]

Creates a Flask application configured for testing.

customers.tests.test_app.client(app)[source]

Provides a test client for the Flask application.

customers.tests.test_app.db_session()[source]

Creates a new database session for a test.

customers.tests.test_app.get_auth_token(client)[source]

Logs in both admin and regular user to obtain JWT tokens. Returns a dictionary with ‘admin’ and ‘user’ tokens.

Module Contents

The customers.tests package combines memory and performance profiling with unit testing to ensure robust and efficient customer management.
